April 20, 1954
Mr. Donald E. Bird, Executive Secretary
National Society for the Study of Communication
Stephens College
Columbia, Missouri
Dear Mr. Birdi
It's very nice indeed to know of your organisation. I
should be glad to send you our Newsletter if you'd care to
have us sent your Journal. This is our general practice rather
than paying a membership fee, for the numerous organisations
with which we have an exchange basis.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
